channel.title: Yorkshire (Junior) Graphics Design ~
channel.description:
[u][i]YGD - Yorkshire (Junior) Graphics Design[/i][/u]
[i]Yorkshire Graphics Design is desinged to help MoparScape "server makers." We make banners, give you codes, help you with websites, sources, bases, FAQ's, and last but not least, clients. We, if you do, YGD also provide Habbo retro information and all the rest of it. We provide exccelent service during the process of "helping you" with any problems with your banners, server sources, bases, codes and all the rest.[/i]
[b][u][i]Step one[/i][/u][/b]: http://z4.invisionfree.com/YGD/ and register. [u][b][i]Step two[/i][/b][/u]: There's forums where you can post for help! [b][i][u]Step three[/u][/i][/b]: We post it back, you take it, you use it. Problem done.
The site and Graphic Designers are ran by Solider Joe (Joe) and M O U S E (Mouse). We are taking on new staff and you can "up-your-grade" if you start low (Recommend - more work graded). We look forward to helping you or making your graphic and drawing skills, higher!
Signed [b][i][u]Mouse[/u][/i][/b] and [b][i][u]Joe[/u][/i][/b] :D :D
Thank you for your time to read this, intresting ;), topic!

item.title: Yorkshire (Junior) Graphics Design ~
item.dc:creator: @Solider_Joe Solider Joe
item.description:
@Solider_Joe wrote:

YGD - Yorkshire (Junior) Graphics Design

Yorkshire Graphics Design is desinged to help MoparScape “server makers.” We make banners, give you codes, help you with websites, sources, bases, FAQ’s, and last but not least, clients. We, if you do, YGD also provide Habbo retro information and all the rest of it. We provide exccelent service during the process of “helping you” with any problems with your banners, server sources, bases, codes and all the rest.

Step one: http://z4.invisionfree.com/YGD/ and register.
Step two: There’s forums where you can post for help!
Step three: We post it back, you take it, you use it.
Problem done.

The site and Graphic Designers are ran by Solider Joe (Joe) and M O U S E (Mouse). We are taking on new staff and you can “up-your-grade” if you start low (Recommend - more work graded). We look forward to helping you or making your graphic and drawing skills, higher!

Signed Mouse and Joe

Thank you for your time to read this, intresting ;), topic!

Read full topic
